nodes.bodyText: nit: why not make BulkLoadHFiles.BULK_LOAD_HFILES_BY_FAMILY public, then remove this variable here?

Is this really needed? Isn't BULK_LOAD_HFILES_BY_FAMILY loaded as false by default if not set on LoadIncrementalHFiles#195? Or perhaps you can move this for a separate method that could be overridden by  TestLoadIncrementalHFilesByFamily to avoid duplicating whole setUpBeforeClass in the child class?

Does this test class actually make sense, without testing the specific new logic added? I mean, even without the group by family feature this test class will pass, so it's not shielding us from inadvertently changes on the new feature.
